title: Native Instruments Traktor Kontrol
description:
Touch strip can be assigned to transport, FX and Loop functions
• Touch sensitive encoders
• 31 buttons, 3 push encoders and 8 knobs
• Change the musical key of a track with Loop encoders while holding SHIFT+PLAY
• Adjustable LED brightness adapts to any environment
• Flux mode now allows you to juggle cue points and loop effects without missing a beat
